name: Office rampage (gemaco1397)
description:
A game made for Trijam 180, made withing 3 hours, with the theme "My weakness is also my strength". You play as a normally calm and collective person, with one weakness, the well-being of your cat. If your cat is threatened or something happens to it, you loose control.

ControlsA & D
left and right
SpaceJumpLeftShiftDash

Assets used:
Simple Office Furniture Set, made by mercyssh
Cozy People by shubibubi
Pixel Office Asset by 2dpig
